lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: Micro credit is the future of poverty alleviation.

lenders.name: Alaska Cares
lenders.loan_because: The world needs individuals to group together for the sake of the common good.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a group of Alaskans including faculty and students of the Rural Development program at the University of Alaska in Fairbanks, students of other programs, and working Alaskans who believe that we can help make this world a better place.

lenders.name: Anna
lenders.loan_because: I want to help create a world community where the boundries between countries will not matter.

lenders.name: Dawn and Craig
lenders.loan_because: we look in to our childrens eyes, they teach us to give.

lenders.name: Paul & Beth
lenders.loan_because: How can we not when we have so much by comparison?

lenders.name: Michele
lenders.loan_because: I loan through KIVA because my faith calls me to act in ways that will create a more just, equitable, and peaceful world.  KIVA loans empower others around the world to create better lives for themselves, their families, and their communities.

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the government to try and make people\'s lives safer and better.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: it\'s relatively easy to raise money in the U.S. to start or expand a business.  I know that is not the case in many parts of the world.  Many people can only dream of owning their own business and controlling their economic destiny.  Let\'s make a difference to these people and share some of what we have.
lenders.occupational_info: While I build houses for a living, I also have gotten a great deal of pleasure from being involved in starting companies with business associates, friends, and loved ones.  Nothing can compare to the feeling of accomplishment and pride I see in the faces of people when they take a struggling young business and put their heart and soul into making it successful.  That\'s the beauty of capitalism and freedom.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: i can.

lenders.name: Brian and Rochelle
lenders.loan_because: I believe self-sustainability benefits a community as much as the individual. I want to help others

lenders.name: Cindy
lenders.loan_because: I believe that supporting small business owners will improve economies and quality of life. I hope that those that receive these loans will be successful and become able to extend similar assistance to others in their community and pass it on.

lenders.name: Patrushka
lenders.loan_because: I like knowing that my money will really have a long-term effect on people who need a helping hand to get going. I\'m excited to be part of their business ventures!

lenders.name: Cathy
lenders.loan_because: I see this as a wonderful opportunity to help others make a better life for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: In my work I support the doctors and nurses of a large not for profit healthcare system who provide the highest quality care and treatment to people in my community.

lenders.name: Ky&Tine
lenders.loan_because: We all need a hand.

lenders.name: Martin
lenders.loan_because:
I loan because this provides a perfect opportunity for performing acts that increase the social welfare, while remaining economically viable.  

I had a professor in college remake the old adage:  "Give a man a fish, and feed him for a day.  Teach a man to fish, and feed him for a lifetime.  Teach a man to start a fishery, and feed a whole village."
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that does large social science research.  My role is to help manage the data.

lenders.name: Tasha
lenders.loan_because: I work for a huge bank that seems to only lend money to people who are already rich.  Now I\'m the banker (on a tiny scale) helping people who aren\'t rich - yet!
lenders.occupational_info: I work in an office, making travel arrangements, setting up meetings, and handling administrative projects for the head of a division of a bank.

lenders.name: Brad
lenders.loan_because: I Can

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: it helps folks, it allows a tangible connection, and i know that the money gets to the people that need it.
lenders.occupational_info: I work helping to set up and monitor HIV treatment clinics primarily in sub-Saharan Africa.

lenders.name: Jason Leslie Rogers
lenders.occupation: Husband and Father, Photographer and Writer
lenders.loan_because: I would want someone to do it for me.
lenders.occupational_info: I spend a lot of time at home taking care of my daughter and our house for my wife and me.  I am also a freelance photographer and writer.

lenders.name: Doug Dosdall
lenders.loan_because: I deeply care about economic development in the developing world and have seen first hand how access to small amounts of capital can change someone\'s life for the better.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop websites and web-based businesses. I am currently specializing in vacation rental websites and hotels and am just starting a project to provide a market for coffee farmers in Oaxaca to sell a value added goods direct to consumers.

lenders.name: Matteo Spreafico
lenders.loan_because: Quando l'ultimo albero sarà tagliato, l'ultimo fiume inquinato, l'ultimo pesce pescato, scoprirete che il denaro non si può mangiare.

lenders.name: Corrie&Myles
lenders.loan_because: We enjoy helping others.

lenders.name: Cindy
lenders.loan_because: A little help goes a long ways!

lenders.name: keith and cat
lenders.loan_because: We think it can make a difference, that initiative should be encouraged, that too many of us have it way too good and that we don\'t get involved enough.
lenders.occupational_info: Cat teaches English at a university and Keith teaches to advertising professionals and manages other English teachers

lenders.name: isabella
lenders.loan_because: i prefere to help people in giving them an opportunity to help themselves
lenders.occupational_info: i work in the emergency room of a big hospital in the center of rome

lenders.name: Colton
lenders.loan_because: I am more fortunate than many.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage various computer system projects for Wells Fargo Bank\'s Business Internet division.

lenders.name: karen
lenders.loan_because: I've been hungry.
lenders.occupational_info: I study plant communites and work to preserve natural areas.

lenders.name: Maureen
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference and want to share the blessings I have been given.

lenders.name: Jane
lenders.loan_because: It is a great way to contribute to someone else's quality of life - in whichever way they choose.
lenders.occupational_info: I consult on ways to unleash entrepreneurship and its contribution to human development

lenders.name: Christy-CityGirls Group
lenders.loan_because: A pilgrimage, after all, is a strenuous undertaking, one in which companionship and support may be pivotal. - Julia Cameron

lenders.name: Felicia
lenders.loan_because: capitalism works--- individual initiative trumps government-run projects. It's all based on people's incentives.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop ways to increase profitability

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because: People helping people grow is one of humanity's greatest calllings..
lenders.occupational_info: I oversee an accounting group that keeps the financial records for a company.

lenders.name: Marie
lenders.loan_because: I can.  The only reason I can is because I have received so much support from my friends and family throughout my life.  This is my chance to extend that grace to others, whose only deficiency in the pursuit of their goals is capital.
lenders.occupational_info: I counsel employees about the benefits to which they are entitled, such as health insurance, life insurance, and help them when they are ready to retire.

lenders.name: ShootsTheMoon
lenders.loan_because: It is important to help the world become a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a geek, and a dancer.

lenders.name: Jenn
lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: I would like for others to have at least a small part of the opportunity I have had.
lenders.occupational_info: Computer Programmer

lenders.name: Andy
lenders.loan_because: I believe I can make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with refugees.

lenders.name: Liza
lenders.loan_because: This can really make a difference to a person\'s life, for such a small amount (to us).  There really seems to be no downside.
lenders.occupational_info: I set up health plans for employers. This allows them to give their employees life insurance, health and dental care.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: What more sensible way to help those who are really trying to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Worked with handicapped people until retirement.

lenders.name: parisa
lenders.loan_because:
I believe I have a responsibility towards my fellow human beings.  We are all citizens of the world.  All that is here belongs to all of us.  I happen to be more fortunate to be able to study and work but I never forget about those who haven't been as fortunate as me.  I feel I am responsible for what happens to them.  I cannot just shot my eyes or close my ears....
This is my responsibility as a human being...
Thank you KIVA to make it easy and possible for us!

lenders.name: Carla
lenders.occupational_info: Global Jewelry at Your Fingertips.

lenders.name: Philippe
lenders.occupational_info: Real Estate Development in SouthWest US

lenders.name: Corey
lenders.loan_because: everyone needs a helping hand now and again, and this is an easy way to offer that hand to someone in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a small organization that connects the global food community by linking specialty food companies to producers and building opportunities for global food tourism.

lenders.name: Irish Family
lenders.loan_because: We want to help those striving to succeed and live in peace.
lenders.occupational_info: We do our best to live in integrity and harmony with the world.

lenders.name: staceyjoy
lenders.loan_because: I'm thrilled that I can provide some support to women around the world!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a knitwear designer, and own a small boutique in Brooklyn, NY, US.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: It is the smallest gifts in life that make big differences.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers.

lenders.name: Joel
lenders.loan_because: I have been in need of a helping hand in the past and am grateful to all those that helped me.  It seems to be the least I could do to help others make their dreams come to fruition.
lenders.occupational_info: I use geographic computer technology to map the world in which we live.  I also analyze the impact of humans on the earth .

lenders.name: Joanne
lenders.loan_because: I want to "pay it forward."

lenders.name: Vanessa
lenders.loan_because: I believe that in lending theres power, and helping others is like helping your self succeed in life.
lenders.occupational_info: As something that everyone who has the mean should do, a little grain of rise that shift the balance!!!

lenders.name: Ralph W
lenders.loan_because: Money makes the world to around
lenders.occupational_info: I am a lawyer. I interpret and apply the law to facts created by other people.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: Money is relative in value. I\'m not rich by American standards but what little I have can go a long way in other parts of the world. I want to help those who help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a musician at heart but I make money as a carpenter. I fix things in homes before they go on the market to be sold.

lenders.name: Ava, Susie & Shahram
lenders.loan_because: This is the greate place to help others help themselves overcome poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on computer applications to facilitate business processes.

lenders.name: Wade
lenders.loan_because: God works through us.

lenders.name: Kiera
lenders.loan_because: I wanted to realize my dream of becoming a professional musician, but I needed help.  Thanks to the amazing financial/spiritual/emotional support given to me by others, I am now living my dream.  Now it\'s my turn to help others realize their dreams, and I can\'t wait!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a classical singer, better known as an \"opera singer\".  Every day I have the privilege of performing incredible music by the great composers of the past, as well as helping living composers bring their compositions to life for the first time.

lenders.name: Mike/Matthew
lenders.loan_because: We respect the efforts of others trying to better thier lives and the lives of people in their communities in areas with fewer opportunities. We enjoy traveling the world engaging in diffrent cultures and would like to support their efforts.
lenders.occupational_info: Medical Device sales management/6th grader

lenders.name: Bellamy-Allen Families
lenders.loan_because: It makes a great holiday gift for loved ones while helping others around the world

lenders.name: Meredith
lenders.loan_because: It makes me happy to help others grow their businesses and improve their lives.

lenders.name: Kristi
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently a University Student at the University of Victoria in Victoria,British Columbia. I am studying my Bachelor of Education, for I hope to be a Elementary Teacher when I am finished. I would love to travel and teach internationally as well, in the future.

lenders.name: Sarah and John
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the ingenuity of others.
lenders.occupational_info: Sarah works as a book editor. John is a graduate student in engineering, working to create a renewable source of fuel.

lenders.name: Janet
lenders.loan_because: Microloans are such an effective way to help small entrepreneurs establish and improve their businesses. It is a direct way that I can impact low-income individuals who have a dream.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping authors refine manuscripts to publishable condition.Advocacy for education for English-language learners, low-income children. To educate other Americans about the rest of the nonEuropean world.

lenders.name: Ross
lenders.loan_because: the entrepreneurial spirit lives in all of us!
lenders.occupational_info: My interest is in how institutions and policy foster entrepreneurial activity around the world.

lenders.name: GoodWire.org
lenders.loan_because: You visit GoodWire.org to read positve news stories and interesting, upbeat articles.  Socially and environmentally-conscious advertisers pay to advertise on GoodWire.org.  80% of advertising revenues are given to Kiva.org
lenders.occupational_info: I love what I do.  What could be better than a job that affects people\'s lives in a postive way?  It\'s a truly win-win situation for everyone.  Thanks for helping!

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: I believe there is goodness in this world, and it is worth fighting for it.

lenders.name: Jim & Leise`
lenders.loan_because: I can!
lenders.occupational_info: We travel the world and share our experiences while encouraging others to live their dreams.

lenders.name: Frenzy
lenders.loan_because: Because its the right thing to do, I support people that want better control of their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: Building strong bodies, minds, and spirits

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed.  This is my way to give back by giving others a helping hand.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.occupational_info: I work in an office in New York City\'s Times Square. It's very busy!

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: I want to reach out to women around the globe who are furthering their economic goals for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach young children to experience the world of Art by learning about famous artists and creating their own masterpieces.  We explore various Art forms from many different lands and cultures world-wide.

lenders.name: Harry
lenders.loan_because:
this can make a real difference in real people's lives. I want to help people who want to help themselves. I appreciate how personal this process is. 
Thank you, Kiva!
lenders.occupational_info: My whole life I have helped people with mental illnesses. Now I help design and run programs for people with these crippling disabilities for a county government in California.

lenders.name: Jim Barton
lenders.loan_because: I think there's no better way to make a difference in the world than micro loans.
lenders.occupational_info: Director and writer for commercials, web productions and corporate communications.

lenders.name: Y0NG
lenders.loan_because: I love to help the working poor people around the world.

lenders.name: Sumit Chachra
lenders.loan_because: I think small amounts of money I lend can make a big difference in someones life!

lenders.name: silvia
lenders.loan_because: Because the sea is made of billions of tiny little drops.

lenders.name: MikeH
lenders.loan_because: this is the best way to help those in need.

lenders.name: Chiara
lenders.loan_because: I like it.

lenders.name: Gianni
lenders.loan_because: I believe in loyalty, confidence and collaboration
lenders.occupational_info: manager

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: i care.
lenders.occupational_info: I believe in grassroots.

lenders.name: Pam
lenders.loan_because: I want to teach my kids that we're all responsible for our world and the people in it.  It's such a reward to help others succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: Raising kids is great work if you can get it.

lenders.name: Larry Gay
lenders.loan_because: I believe it is important to help individuals, especially women to better their economic conditions. We need to help others in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a graduate professor of education and I teach teachers and administrators about leadership.

lenders.name: Jen
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we can and we should.
lenders.occupational_info: Jen is a Geography professor. Her interests are urban poverty in the United States and Ghana.

lenders.name: jen
lenders.loan_because: i admire people who have the initiative and dedication it takes to be an entrepreneur.
lenders.occupational_info: i help the united states government enforce our laws protecting american workers.

lenders.name: Josie
lenders.loan_because: My mommy says so.
lenders.occupational_info: My mom said that before I was born she had her own business making wedding cakes and desserts for restaurants.  She told me that this type of work is challenging and rewarding & she wants to help others achieve their goals.

lenders.name: Sachyn
lenders.loan_because:
We all have a responsibility to help those less fortunate and one person can make a difference. 
Its fantastic to be able to see and help the people who are taking the chance to turn their lives around rather to have my money sent to a faceless charity.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.occupation: teacher of English as a Second Language

lenders.name: Brian and Jeannie
lenders.loan_because: We want to share our blessings with people around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Brian is a programmer.  I am a student.

lenders.name: Jean
lenders.loan_because: I can, and I admire entrepreneurs and have faith in their ability to change the world.

lenders.name: A Cellar Full of Noise
lenders.loan_because: We support KIVA to help other agricultural producers and entrepreneurs to develop their resources and skills in the hopes that they will be as fortunate as we are in making a living working with our land.
lenders.occupational_info: We are grape growers and wine producers in California's Central Coast.

lenders.name: Kiera
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers

lenders.name: Bohica
lenders.loan_because: Helping people help themselves is the best way to create positive change and make the world a better place for everyone.

lenders.name: Luz
lenders.occupation: freelance writer, former reporter and mother

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed with an amazing family and it is away for me to share with others. I believe we all share in the responsibilty of pulling another person up.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with homeless and low income families to find safe, clean, and affordable housing.

lenders.name: doug
lenders.loan_because: Why wouldn't we?

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: It makes good financial/ethical sense to let the money work and help others rather than sit in a savings account.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an artist that uses computers to make art and animations for video games.

lenders.name: karin
lenders.occupational_info: teaching college students with learning difficulties.

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: I need Karma credits (and my wife wouldn\'t leave me alone)

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: I believe that the way to make the world a better place is to help each other.  Lending money to these hardworking folks is one way I can contribute to and promote this spirit of kindness.

lenders.name: michael
lenders.loan_because: I should

lenders.name: Renee
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good to know I'm helping others to improve thier lifes.
lenders.occupational_info: I reconcile Bank accounts daily and monthly for a large Life Insurance company.

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.occupational_info: My Company is a web site that lets people turn music they own into their own custom ringtones for their mobile phones.

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: It\'s better to give than receive! I am excited to help people grow their small business.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage sales people. Our company sells software and computers.

lenders.name: Jonelle
lenders.loan_because: I respect all of humankind\'s right to create the life God intended for them and I truly believe we are all in this world together for a reason. It takes a village.
lenders.occupational_info: I am responsible for taking care of the basic needs of the people who are hired to work for my company. This allows our employees to concentrate on the job our company hired them to do. I help in providing medical benefits, paychecks, career development and hiring of new employees.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: Every human being is precious. What are we here for if not to encourage each other through life\'s journey? As a follower of Jesus, I long to be gracious toward others, just as God has been so gracious toward me.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a university assisting college students with disabilities who need services in order to have equal access to their education (for example: sign language interpreters in class so deaf students can participate in class lectures; audio books so those who are blind can \"read\" their text books, etc).

lenders.name: Ryan and Colleen
lenders.loan_because: People deserve the chance to pursue their personal dreams. We are blessed with the resources to help these dreams become reality.

lenders.name: John Boddie
lenders.loan_because: Lending is slightly addictive. It feels like the world's slowest video game. That appeals to me.
lenders.occupational_info: I write project-related articles for a major international donor agency. Most of these articles are based on interviews with villagers in rural Afghanistan.  Prior to this, I spent 2 years in India & 2 years in Singapore working with small companies, some of which were similar to Kiva Portfolio companies

lenders.name: Chrissy
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed to have my dream job as a teacher.  Now, I want to help people make their dreams of becoming an entrepreneur come true.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an elementary school teacher.  I have the most rewarding job I can think of.  Being able to teach children and watch them grow and mature into smart young adults is the best feeling in the world.

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: ..of a generous boss.

lenders.name: erin
lenders.loan_because: Most Americans, however we may complain, are richer than we know, and I think most of us take it for granted.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people of different ages and abilities learn the skills to travel through their lives independently, happily, and hopefully, peacefully.

lenders.name: Jack
lenders.loan_because: It\'s the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: Purchasing agent

lenders.name: TheWorrellGodParents
lenders.loan_because: We want to help people around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: We are just regular families that like to help others.

lenders.name: Maxine
lenders.loan_because: I am so lucky to have all that I have

lenders.name: California Kids
lenders.loan_because: it is a great example for us to set for our children.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a group of parents and kids that got together for playtime 12 years ago.  Our oldest children are almost in college.  Community service is important to us all.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: Small  steps  can  make  a  difference  towards  a  big  change.
lenders.occupational_info: I  advise  people  how  to  take  care  of  their  money  in  order  to  try  to  fulfill  their  dreams.

lenders.name: Mary LeBus
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other people, & that makes me feel good about myself.
lenders.occupational_info: I play music & teach harp & piano & have fun \"Jamming\" with my friends.

lenders.name: NativeTexan
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping others succeed in bettering their lives & I believe they will in turn (& consequentially) improve the lives around them. The best most rewarding investment is investing in the lives of others. Christ/God blesses me financially so I want to share my blessings from Him with others.  I bless these loans and their recipients with prosperity.
lenders.occupational_info: I do electronic/electrical controls related work for semiconductor & other industrial customers, and municipalities.\r\n

lenders.name: Eli
lenders.loan_because: I care

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping others.  Helping goes in cycles.  I want to help others while I can, because someday I may need help myself.  Also, I really admire those who have a vision and gameplan for achieving their goals.

lenders.name: Wulan
lenders.loan_because: I believe in lending the hook than giving the fish :)

lenders.name: Paula
lenders.loan_because: small things make a difference
lenders.occupational_info: electronics

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: because my beautiful grandchildren deserve a kinder, more caring world.  For me, the way to accomplish this is through helping people succeed and become independent.   It is my dream that those that are helped will help others.

lenders.name: Beth
lenders.loan_because: I want to help individuals in a more personal way than donating to large charitable organizations.  I want to know I've made a difference in a person's life.  I believe in providing a sustainable income.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently teaching English to a Korean businessman who has moved his family to the Denver, CO, area to start the USA office of his company in Korea.

lenders.name: Shane
lenders.loan_because: I am thankful for what I have and want to share. My Nana & Pappers are teaching me about people and places around the world. Someday I will go to these places and meet my Kiva friends.

lenders.name: Cara and Rick
lenders.loan_because: As a member of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter Day Saints( The Mormons), I believe in helping my Brother, no matter where he is.
lenders.occupational_info: Boring, but necessary. We have spent more time developing land, than in our actual vocation. We own Apache Fort Investigations. 480-200-6266

lenders.name: teresa and rick
lenders.loan_because: It's the best way we know to do a little bit to redistribute wealth in the world. We were involved in another  small loans fund for 4 years in the late 90s. We loaned out the total fund of $7000 over and over in small loans in a slum in Morocco. We got the whole sum back after 4 years when private small loans funds were outlawed by the Moroccan government.
lenders.occupational_info: I volunteer my time as a reading teacher, translator, and copy-editor. I translate French to English and copy-edit also for Kiva. Rick earns the big bucks that pay for the loans.

lenders.name: Robin
lenders.loan_because: I believe in global economic justice - and working to achieve that politically and redistributing income now through efforts like Kiva.
lenders.occupational_info: My organization - Texas Campaign for the Environment - works to organize Texans to improve our health and environment through door-to-door organizing, action that will get the attention of the public and through legislation.  We are working to have computer, TV and electronics companies take back old equipment for safe recycling.

lenders.name: Marcia & Mark
lenders.loan_because: We have been blessed and we wanted to think bigger than ourselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Marcia is a teacher and Mark is a hospital administrator.

lenders.name: Lars
lenders.loan_because: i believe it will help people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: ... i listen to my teacher say things and teach us.  My favorite subject is social studies.

lenders.name: dave
lenders.loan_because: I loan to try to make the world a better place.  I believe individuals who 'have' must help those who have little.  US Kiva members help to counteract our country's abysmal foreign policy and economic positions.

lenders.name: ina
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people find information.

lenders.name: Cristina
lenders.loan_because: I have the chance of help.
lenders.occupational_info: Currently doing an MBA in Paris.

lenders.name: Joel
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: Teacher

lenders.name: Drew McIntosh
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Sky
lenders.loan_because:
"there but for the grace of god go I"
By chance I was born, live and work in a country of excess- so i spread it around!
lenders.occupational_info: i deal poker.  presently, I don't work for any one casino.  I deal major tournaments in the u.s. and Europe.  Most of my poker income is derived from tokes (tips).  I also work part-time in a retail woman's clothing store.

lenders.name: USCMeche
lenders.loan_because: I hope that each loan helps a person in poverty, and that these people can be an inspiriation to the friends and family around them.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an engineering student looking to pursue a legal education after graduation to develop a non-profit focused on work projects within the US and abroad.

lenders.name: Greg & Sylvia
lenders.loan_because: It is important to share the bounty that we have received by mearly being born in Canada.  And, it is important to assist those who have the initiative to take responsibility for their future.  Everyone benefits.
lenders.occupational_info: We are both retired from our previous work  which was for Greg a community planner and Sylvia an airline flight attendant.

lenders.name: Asia and Rueben
lenders.loan_because: it's important
lenders.occupational_info: math + music = fun

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: It follows the maxim of "Give a man a fish and he eats for a day, Teach a man to fish and he eats for life."
lenders.occupational_info: I fix computers (software and hardware).

lenders.name: Jane
lenders.loan_because: I want to help women
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a college library helping young people find books and information for their studies

lenders.name: Huy
lenders.loan_because: it's a fantastic idea

lenders.name: Buttercup
lenders.loan_because: The gift has been given, in Jesus' name, The Son of The One True God. The Word of God instructs us as Christians to love our neighbors as ourselves. Because the Lord loved me before I knew Him and blesses my life, I pray to love all people so that they might know the love of the Lord that has changed my life and that he loves them too.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Homemaker former Home Educator.  I am single and have three adult children, 2 sons, and 1 daughter. I love to study the Bible and aspire to write a book in the near future as well.

lenders.name: Mike and Mim
lenders.loan_because: We believe that we are all one and that what we do, or do not do, has an impact on everyone. We want to have a positive impact on those less fortunate than us.
lenders.occupational_info: We live on a boat where we have our computer-based business which is web and print design, mostly for small businesses.

lenders.name: Trooper
lenders.loan_because: The gift has been given. In His name we are to share. God Bless Us Every One.
lenders.occupational_info: Video Engineer

lenders.name: Joshua
lenders.loan_because: I want to help empower others to improve their lives and the lives of others in their community.
lenders.occupational_info: I help companies become more profitable and achieve more of their goals.

lenders.name: Simone
lenders.loan_because: My husband was sweet enough to give me and someone else a wonderful gift.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a 60 year old ceramic company that manufactures tableware and tile in Sausalito, California. I am in sales and marketing.

lenders.name: Pippo
lenders.loan_because: It\'s the better way to do something about te developping countries. What\'s more If I\'d sent my money to any huge internatioal organizations just a few of them will reach the people I\'d like to substain.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a pubblic organizations dealing with international cooperations. So I know almost all about that. That is why I\'ve decided to send my money trough Kiva organization......

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: I want to
lenders.occupational_info: I analyse market dynamics and statistics. I am an economist in Los Angeles California, USA

lenders.name: robyn
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a science museum in San Francisco.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: I grew up without a lot of money and now have a chance to help others.

lenders.name: David
lenders.occupational_info: I help provide reproductive health services to women, men and teens.

lenders.name: MJ and Liz
lenders.occupation: Grad Student and Director of Nonprofit

lenders.name: Andy
lenders.loan_because: I wanted to do something meaningful and this was one way to accomplish that.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm the program coordinator at a Team Challenge course.

lenders.name: Francesco
lenders.loan_because: I think this a way to get a better world.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm technician in a coal fired power station.

lenders.name: Mattea
lenders.loan_because: It doesn't matter if it's $25 or $250 it still makes a difference. :)

lenders.name: Janusz
lenders.occupational_info: I am a painter and sculptor, working mostly with cast glass

lenders.name: Carolyn
lenders.loan_because: i heard about kiva and i thought it was a great idea, i hope it works!
lenders.occupational_info: i design medical instruments which are used to diagnose disease

lenders.name: Thia
lenders.loan_because: We people of this planet are all connected.  I am a single mother and fortunate to have a good job.  I can support my three children and I wish that for all people.

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: It\'s a direct and immediate way to help people.

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: Its easy to help and you get to see constant progress

lenders.name: Dianne
lenders.loan_because: People need help especially because right now a lot of people on this earth are very hungry.  Let's make sure they get fed.

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: To make a difference in peoples' lives.
lenders.occupational_info: Offering a global perspective to the resolution of conflicts.

lenders.name: Henry
lenders.loan_because: My children received a monetary gift from a stranger and my oldest felt it would be best to pass on our good fortune to someone less fortunate. I recommended KIVA and they all (eventually) agreed it was a great idea.
lenders.occupational_info: I support a computer network for a midsized company in America.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: to help others who are not as fortunate, and enable them to get ahead in life

lenders.name: Apple
lenders.loan_because: The gift has been given, in His name we are to share.\r\nGod Bless Us Everyone\r\n

lenders.name: Marks Family
lenders.loan_because: Our family is fortunate and we believe we should all help eachother a little bit... and that hard work pays off.  So we and our children are happy to set aside some of our hard-earned money to help others do the same.  Much of this money was earned/saved by our children to lend and share in this way.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in software development managing teams that create new products and sell them globally.  My wife is a teacher and a volunteer.  My children go to school.

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: it's good to help another person. This is what makes life worth living.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers.

lenders.name: Funky Monkey
lenders.loan_because: Helping people help themselves inspires me. You always receive more than you can give.  Kiva rocks, thanks for the opportunity to be a part of something that makes a real difference!

lenders.name: Grashin Fam
lenders.loan_because: we want to participate in social change
lenders.occupational_info: helping those in need

lenders.name: Martin
lenders.loan_because: As I believe in the principle of Sharing, I am trying to put it in practice. Comme je crois au principe du Partage, j\'essaie de le mettre en pratique.
lenders.occupational_info: I worked in the public health field, but I am retired now. I am a member of a non profit organization that publicises the principle of Sharing. Visit it: www.share-international.org. Je travaillais dans le domaine de la santé publique, mais je suis à ma retraite maintenant. Je fais partie d\'un organisme à but non lucratif qui oeuvre à répandre le plus possible le principe du partage. Visitez-le : www.taraquebec.org

lenders.name: John
lenders.occupational_info: I teach the science of drugs (pharmacology) to pharmacy students.

lenders.name: Anand
lenders.loan_because: I think this is the best way I can make an impact on an individual.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a physician in training.

lenders.name: Pete
lenders.loan_because: All people deserve a chance to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I write an online journal about the city in which I live, Fort Worth, Texas.  It is called \"Cowtown\" because there is a long history of cattle raising in this area.

lenders.name: William Zaffer
lenders.loan_because: I feel that our country  needs to show compassion and not violence around the world plus teach people to learn to have less children to stay out of poverty and the issue of global warming must be dealt with throughout the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell manufactured or mobile homes in retirement and family parks but my passion is teaching how to live environmentally and make the world a better place to live/

lenders.name: Shanna
lenders.loan_because: I like to encourage entrepreneurship and self-sufficiency.  I believe that voluntary charity is the best form of aid.

lenders.name: Kate McCullough
lenders.loan_because: nobody should feel stuck and powerless by the circumstances he or she finds themselves in...they should have the opportunity to make their lives (and that of their families) better if they have the desire and courage to do so.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: I have been greatly blessed in my life, particularly in our abundant United States of America and I want to help others with a hand up to become self-sufficient with an abundant life of their own for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the travel business, creating computer systems that help facilitate people traveling anywhere in the world.

lenders.name: Alan
lenders.loan_because: It's a brilliant idea. I Kiva for selfish reasons....It feels good.  Kiva Kiva is better than Kava Kava..... ;) "Giva" somebody a hand....Kiva.org
lenders.occupational_info:
I too am a small Business owner. I buy interesting things and then sell them in interesting places...
Kiva.org has inspired me to do a lot more....big things to come!

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: I love the spirit  of an independent entrepreneur.
lenders.occupational_info: I

lenders.name: Brooke
lenders.occupation: Kiva PR and Social Business Consultant
lenders.loan_because: I became involved with Kiva simply by chance and I am so glad it happened! I now work with Kiva and 2 other socially minded organizations (ChangeFusion.org and AllDayBuffet.org) and feel that my time and energy is spent doing something I really care about.
lenders.occupational_info:
I work for an organization called ChangeFusion that provides business support and incubation for start-up social businesses.  These are businesses that focus on helping people and the planet while making a profit so they arent' dependent on donations.

I also have worked doing Customer Service and Public Relations for Kiva since 2006.

And I also work as a Social Business Developer for All Day Buffet.

lenders.name: Roslyn
lenders.loan_because: it's interesting

lenders.name: Bob F.
lenders.loan_because: Its the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: one does what one can.
lenders.occupational_info: librarian

lenders.name: Paul and Carole
lenders.loan_because: We are able to help other people achieve some of the things that are important to them.
lenders.occupational_info: Carole teaches reading to children who have difficulty learning to read. They are between 5 and 10 years old.  Paul\'s job is keeping computers current, safe, and available for the people who use them.

lenders.name: Kenneth
lenders.loan_because: I have the means with which to help out others. I know how hard it is to start up your own business. Although the rewards are great, it is a stressful under taking and if I can help in a small way I am happy to.  I have now decided that instead of giving my clients gift every year, I'm donating those monies to Kiva, and encouraging my clients to do the same.

lenders.name: Karen and Dave
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should be given the opportunity to pursue their dreams.

lenders.name: Love Turkey
lenders.occupation: toungue shaver and spider monkey therapist
lenders.loan_because: I hate america like all liberals do.
lenders.occupational_info: Training seals to type novels and grooming emus

lenders.name: Sage
lenders.occupational_info: I am a storyteller.

lenders.name: sinead
lenders.loan_because: I want to do what I can to help other people overcome poverty. I think this is a  great opportunity to do so and it\'s great how it makes the world feel like a smaller place.
lenders.occupational_info: I\'m an aspiring teacher. I\'m going back to school next year to get my credentials & I hope to teach all around the world.

lenders.name: Marco
lenders.loan_because: I think that microcredit is a real aid to poor nations.

lenders.name: Sue
lenders.loan_because: "If you can't feed one hundred people, then feed just one." - Mother Teresa
lenders.occupational_info: I teach 12-13 year old students how to write and communicate effectively.

lenders.name: ruth
lenders.occupation: food and info shop co-op member

lenders.name: Jack
lenders.loan_because: I think it's a good idea to support small business worldwide.  I like to help others who work to better their situation.

lenders.name: Kristie & Dave
lenders.loan_because: I believe that small business is the way out of poverty- which hopefully will lead to a better quality of life for all.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I have seen how in developing areas of the world small amounts of money can do so much good.  Microfinance loans help the recipients to work towards self sufficiency and a better life for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a repair shop where I repair and maintain cars and trucks.

lenders.name: Marlene
lenders.loan_because: I like to help others who are less fortunate than I am, this is due to  my grandmother who was a very generous and extraordinary woman.  Although we were very poor growing up in Jamaica she would help others if they were in need even though we didn't have very much. She was a and still is a great influence in my life and is responsible for the person I am today.
lenders.occupational_info: As an Accountant I help clients maintain their books and records and to file their taxes and other information to the various government offices.  I am the owner of a small accounting & taxation practice in Barrhaven (Nepean) Ottawa.

lenders.name: Rosemary
lenders.loan_because: One person can make a difference.

lenders.name: Erik
lenders.loan_because: I understand the need for access to capital and want to give others a chance to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I put together contracts for a company that moves oil drilling rigs.

lenders.name: Ahmed
lenders.loan_because: i need to incress my Business its growing good
lenders.occupational_info: reatal of bullding supply

lenders.name: Tim & Sharon
lenders.loan_because: \"it\'s a small world after all.\" How nice to know that our funds go directly to a faraway person who wants to get ahead.
lenders.occupational_info: Tim and Sharon have been together since 1971, raising 2 kids with emphasis on travel and learning about the world. Tim works as a one-man logging contractor (Blue Ox Logging, Inc.), selectively cutting Indiana hardwood trees.  Sharon is a high school librarian.

lenders.name: Lee
lenders.loan_because: I loved travelling in Africa and want to do my part to help those poor over-worked women.  PLus it gives me  a reason to go back again!
lenders.occupational_info: I source special gift items, silks & accessories from all the world for resale.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I CAN!!!  Be the change you wish to see.......

lenders.name: AnthroDiva
lenders.loan_because: I believe that small steps can make a huge difference, and that people who were privileged to be born into the wealthy parts of the globe have an obligation to help those who did not win the same lottery!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a teacher, researcher, and writer. I try and use my teaching of anthropology to get American students to open their eyes and learn more about the planet they live on and the people they share it with.

lenders.name: natalie
lenders.loan_because: One person can make a difference...

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: I see lending as a way to connect to the world beyond me.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach history to typical teenagers in the United States

lenders.name: Philip, Ann and Emma
lenders.loan_because: We loan because it's a simple way to help people, and besides...we can't think of any reasons not to!
lenders.occupational_info: One is a music producer, one makes documentaries, and the third goes to school and takes photographs.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: It's amazing how much a little bit of money can do when it goes to the right person and place.
lenders.occupational_info: I string words together in ways that help my clients make money, with a little left over for me.

lenders.name: Gianluca
lenders.loan_because: Partita finisce quando arbitro fischia

lenders.name: Peter & Heather
lenders.occupational_info: Peter works on Wind Turbines.  Heather is a manager at a small bank.

lenders.name: Cristiano
lenders.loan_because: Teach a person how to fish and they will not go hungry again.  I believe the best way to help others is to provide the tools for them to help themselves.  Nothing is more exciting and rewarding than to run your own successful business.  I know from experience.  Thanks to Kiva, I can now have a greater impact in the continent where humanity originated, Afrika!
lenders.occupational_info: The civil engineering profession spans many areas, including earthwork, infrastructure, and transportation.  My expertise lies in soils engineering (also known as geotechnical engineering), which deals primarily with earthwork and foundations.  Always remember, unless you are on water, you need soil on which to build something!

lenders.name: Hana
lenders.loan_because: I like seeing others succeed
lenders.occupational_info: I raised 4 girls and sent them successfully into the world

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach college students how to read, and think, and write about literature. I also teach about gay and lesbian literature, history, and culture.

lenders.name: Micki and Tellie
lenders.loan_because: I have a little and that seems to help others a lot.

lenders.name: Blaine
lenders.loan_because: Just something I can do to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a civil engineering company completing rainfall/runoff studies that go to protect communities from large-scale flooding events.

lenders.name: Marcia
lenders.loan_because: I want to help individuals in a way that fits their needs. It's important to me that I am able to see and know this person and understand what she wants her life to look like. I think it's more beneficial to let each person define what she needs than to give to a big charity with lists of rules and regulations. This way the money loaned is spent exactly the way it needs to be spent. Best of all, when the loan is re-payed I get to re-lend which means more happiness for me too.

lenders.name: Tom & Kym
lenders.loan_because: If we don't who will; besides it's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Kyle Moore
lenders.loan_because:
"Poverty does not belong in civilized human society.  Its proper place is in a museum.  That's where it will be."
- Muhammad Yunus

lenders.name: Marissa
lenders.occupational_info: every day i go to school and do all of my required work.

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.loan_because: A small amount of money can make a big difference for someone else

lenders.name: Julia
lenders.loan_because: I would like to try to make a difference even if it\'s a small one.
lenders.occupational_info: Full time student...I also sell vintage dresses on Ebay, mostly as a hobby.

lenders.name: Nicolas Scheepers
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is an organization that helps people make a difference in their communities, and because, coming from South Africa, I understand the effect poverty has on the less fortunate.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a student at UCLA interested in film production

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people in Ecuador and other developing countries build and sustain their own businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an artist that paints and draws portraits.

lenders.name: Christine & Mary Alice
lenders.loan_because: We stopped buying Holiday gifts for each other and each year we add the money we would have spent to our loan fund. We loan because it helps us feel connected to people we live with in this world but would never get to meet.
lenders.occupational_info: Christine is a nurse who helps people with developmental disabilites to have healthier and more independent lives. Mary Alice is a social worker who helps troubled families to do better and stay together. Christine's mother Raymonde is 93 years old and keeps up with world news and is a great cook.

lenders.name: Scott & Laurie
lenders.loan_because: To give other people the same opportunitiies that I had to get into business.

lenders.name: Mia
lenders.loan_because: Helping people help themselves is, to my mind, one of the best ways of respecting the dignity of my fellow human beings, and promoting basic social and economic values.
lenders.occupational_info: I have two jobs: I help students learn to read and think about philosophy, and I write fiction and non-fiction.

lenders.name: Douglas
lenders.occupational_info: house builder

lenders.name: Victoria
lenders.loan_because: Economic growth creates peace and stability for everyone.
lenders.occupational_info: I raise money for a microlending institution in the United States.

lenders.name: Dr. Peter Copp
lenders.loan_because: Money is contraband.  (Jimmy Buffet)
lenders.occupational_info: We help others improve and maitain their quality of life by improving and maintaining a vital part of themselves - their mouths. Since many are anxious about dental treatment, we are also trained in General Anaesthesia so patients can sleep while we care for them.

lenders.name: Maureen
lenders.loan_because: it is a very minor, simple thing to do that can make a difference to someone in need.
lenders.occupational_info: educate and assist middle school children.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because:
Proverbs 19:17 - If you help the poor, you are lending to the Lord—and he will repay you!

Proverbs 28:27 - Whoever gives to the poor will lack nothing, but those who close their eyes to poverty will be cursed.

Proverbs 31:8-9 -Speak up for those who cannot speak for themselves, for the rights of all who are destitute. Speak up and judge fairly; defend the rights of the poor and needy.

Matthew 25:40 - Then the King will say, 'I'm telling the solemn truth: Whenever you did one of these things to someone overlooked or ignored, that was me—you did it to me.'
lenders.occupational_info: I am a neonatologist.  I take care of babies who are born too early, babies born with birth defects, and babies who are very sick and need intensive care to keep them alive.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Alexis
lenders.loan_because: it's cool to help, in a small way, somebody else succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I work to improve the health care system in the United States

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a graduate student and work part-time as a research assistant and child advocate.

lenders.name: Bryan & Julie
lenders.loan_because: I am a small buiness owner and fortunately  I was lucky enough to have help starting my business. So, I am passing that help along.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in natural healthcare, using my hands to maintain mobility in the spine.

lenders.name: Frank
lenders.occupational_info: I work in manufacturing for Procter & Gamble.

lenders.name: Tamyla
lenders.loan_because: God tells me to.
lenders.occupational_info: Keeping the children safe and healthy.

lenders.name: Preston and Dominique
lenders.loan_because: the loans benefit not just the individual, but entire communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I buy and resell bicycle parts to bike shops. She does graphic design and oil painting.

lenders.name: Bob & Sharon
lenders.loan_because: This is an opportunity to share God's blessings with those who seek to improve the lives of their families and communities.
lenders.occupational_info: We are retired American Soldiers who are now starting a small farm.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: I can\'t think of a way I could make more of a difference with $25
lenders.occupational_info: I help sawmills learn how to get the same amount of lumber while using fewer trees.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: It's the best way to make maximum impact with my charitable dollars & help fellow entrepreneurs across the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Independent artist/designer supplying graphic services for web, print & point of purchase industry.

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: I can!

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I am a very lucky guy. In 2006 my first daughter was born (Kaelyn). I believe that everyone deserves the chance to excel no matter where they live. I hope my small part will help bring success to atleast one eager individual.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the Vice President of a Self Storage company. It is a business that rents out small to medium size garage-like rooms to individuals and businesses that have a surpluss of stuff. We have 109 locations and we are independently owned and operated.

lenders.name: Ted & Darcy
lenders.loan_because: Because as a trustworthy organization, Kiva empowers us to have the greatest impact with our money.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a conservation NGO that develops community projects to alleviate poverty and encourages stewardship of the planet.

lenders.name: BirthCare HealthCare
lenders.loan_because: Loaning through Kiva is one way for our group of Certifed Nurse Midwives to help woman all over the world - not just in our community.
lenders.occupational_info: We provide health care for woman.  Teaching them about their bodies and empowering them to live a healthy life. Assisting woman with their pregnancy and being there to help them bring new life into the world.

lenders.name: Benjamin
lenders.loan_because: I am grateful for the comfortable life I have in the U.S. and wish the same for others.  I also want people in other countries to know that Americans and Jews (I am both) want peace and prosperity for everyone.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a doctor in an emergency department at a hospital.

lenders.name: Tien
lenders.loan_because: I know how hard it is for small businesses out there. We all don't have the resources to expand and thrive so a little help can go a long way. We are all in this together.
lenders.occupational_info: I eat baked goods.
